title: team fire and ice icon
body: when will we get our icons after voting is there a description before u can get them??

replies.body: What site did you vote from?

Close your LoL client and reset it.
Give it time to register as well.

> [{quoted}](name=FuGiTiVeZ,realm=EUNE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=FrWfEJhw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-14T17:04:00.528+0000)
>
> I think it will take some time for you to get your icon. And in case you don't get it just wright a ticket to Riot and im sure they will help you. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

This guy pretty much has the other idea write a ticket if not.
I think it will take some time for you to get your icon. And in case you don't get it just wright a ticket to Riot and im sure they will help you. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
